reviewtext: I like it BUT it has a 3 foot cord.  Add that to the 3 foot cord from my headset and I am dragging around 6 foot of cord.  I have quit using it because I catch it on so many things.  I will be looking for a shorter cord for the headset.  It would have been nice if the cord was removable. I don't really want to replace my headset cord and finding a shorter replacement that will fit my JVC headset is turning out to be a challenge.
